resources.string: Field linguists and open source developers have gotten together to create a speech recognizer for low resource language speakers. You can use this application to prepare your Android to guess your speech. You need to read some suggestions and then contact WiFi in order to prepare your voice model. We expect that after reading some training sentences you will have a better result. Because low resource languages are different from other languages ​​so we do not know how useful this application will be. You can try it, it is mostly experimental and used for research, so we can not guarantee that it will be useful. If you use the app to train your recognizer, you agree that we can use the anonymous training recordings to improve the recognizer and for linguistics research. Here's our resulting research: http://batumi.github.io We don't use or share your private data with anyone. Here is our privacy policy: https://www.lingsync.org/privacy.html
You need to read a few sentences to train the recognizer to your voice and your words
